title: Respect the climb
body:
I want to know about your climb since you have started this game, I will post my climb to give you an example of what I mean.

I started about 1/4 through season 2

This is where I finished each season:

Season 2: Bronze (1050 elo). Top three most played champions: Nasus, Cho'Gath and Olaf. Roughly 100 solo queue games

Season 3: Platinum 1 (92 LP). Top three most player champs: Nasus, Cho'Gath and Vladimir. Roughly 600 solo queue games

Season 4: Diamond 5 (0 LP). Top three most played champions: Nasus, Malphite and Cho'Gath. 170 solo queue games.

I want to see your climb through the ages, this is mine.

Go
